item.question: I get a security error when I try to open the App on Mac.
item.answer: You need to right-click on the App and click Open. Alternatively, allow the App from the Security tab in System Preferences.

item.question: The App doens't open on Windows.
item.answer: You likely have an outdated .NET Framework need to upgrade least version 4.7.2

item.question: How can I bring the window in focus?
item.answer: From the menu, press "UA Midi Control".

item.question: How to use the Button Type (Knob, Momentary, Toggle) ?
item.answer: The Button Type selection in the App needs to match how your button is setup inside your controller. In most cases, the automatic assignment (based on the Parameter type) will work completely fine. Knob and Fader are equivalent. This will not change the actual type of your button in your contrtoller, you can only achieve that with a special customisation software provided by the device manufacturer (if available).
